Description: Please check out my other auctions...lots of guitar related items! Thanks!The 1954 might be called the black sheep of the Michael Kelly 1950's collection. It avoids tradition in favor of a bolder look and tone. With a contoured Alder body and blonde Flamed Maple top, this guitar simply looks and feels amazing. It has a great modern tone thanks to the dual humbucker pickups. This guitar's stock Rockfield pickups have been replaced with Rio Grande pickups for a chunky modern tone. The fast and comfortable Modern C-shaped neck is enhanced with a compound radius on the premium Maple fingerboard. Features · Top: Flame Maple · Body: Alder · Binding: Single Ply White · Construction: Bolt On · Neck: Maple · Fretboard: Maple · Fretboard Radius: Compound 10.5" to 16" · Number of Frets: 22 Medium Jumbo · Inlays: Dots · Headstock: 1950 · Scale Length 25.5 in / 647.7 mm · Truss Rod Type Dual Action · Neck Profile Modern C · Nut Material: Bone · Nut Type: Standard · Electronics: master volume - master tone - 3-way blade switch · Neck Pickup: Rio Grande Genuine Texas Humbucker · Bridge Pickup: Rio Grande BBQ Bucker Humbucker · Hardware Finish: Black · Tuning Keys: Die Cast · Bridge Type: T-Style Condition Near Mint Condition; very clean, with no notable wear or damage. Frets clean, with nice low action. No fret buzz or intonation problems. This is a pre-owned guitar. Product Specs Condition: Excellent (Used) Brand: Michael Kelly Model: 1954 HH Dual Humbucker Flamed Maple Top Finish: Natural Blonde Categories: Solid Body Made In: Indonesia Pickup Description: Official American Rio Grande Texas BBQ Matched Humbucker Pickup Set- All original w/ screws, case, & wiring diagram- Nickel- (Bridge & Neck Position)- 2 Conductor BBQ Bucker Bridge:A classic 50's style Humbucking, but alot more horsepower under the hood! Our most popular humbucking to date....Not a distortion pickup, just more muscle. Bear down on the meat and easy on the potato salad! Recommended bridge position. 2-Conductor cable. Genuine Texas Neck: A bit less powerful than the BBQ, this one is ballsy and rich when wide open yet clean with lots of top and bottom when rolled back slightly. Fusion, Boogie, or down and out Blues City! Great neck position pickup combined with the Barbeque Bucker in the bridge. 2-Conductor cable. Pickup Condition: New Pickups made in: United States
Title: Michael Kelly 1954 HH Flame Tele Style w/USA Rio Grande Texas BBQ Humbuckers
